creator: avarus@mailbolt.com
text:
Hi,

I've been using JMeter for a couple of weeks, and noticed when using the Summary
Report listener that there is no simple way to copy the entire results table to
the clipboard (or else I can't see it!).  I can copy one row at a time by
selecting and using Ctrl+C.

I'm attaching my version of the class which incorporates a big "Copy to
clipboard" button at the bottom.  Don't know if it is any use to you?

Cheers,

TIM

creator: avarus@mailbolt.com
text:
Created attachment 20319
Summary report with a big copy button

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Works fine for me.

Select the first row; hold shift and then select the last row. Then use Ctrl+C.
